testcase.name: search for Beverly Hills
testcase.system-out: * url 'http://api.zippopotam.us/' ......................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed Given path 'us/90210' ..................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match header Content-Type == 'application/json' ....................... passed And match response.country == 'United States' ............................. passed And match response.places[0].['place name'] == 'Beverly Hills' ............ passed And match response.places[0].['state abbreviation'] == 'CA' ............... passed * print karate.pretty(response) ........................................... passed
